text: Charles Pierre Vézina (June 29, 1885 – July 24, 1944) was a Canadian professional ice hockey player. He played with the Montreal Canadiens of the National Hockey Association in the 1911–12 season for one game and scored no goals.SIHR – Player List sihrhockey.org He was the brother of Georges Vézina. ==References== Category:1885 births Category:1944 deaths Category:Canadian ice hockey defencemen Category:Ice hockey people from Quebec Category:Montreal Canadiens (NHA) players
title: Pierre Vézina (ice hockey)
